6.7.9 Persistent storage for in-process compound document servers

OLE-part-init-new

Open generic function

Signature

OLE-part-init-new obj => ()

Arguments

obj
An instance of your subclass of <ole-in-process-server>.

Values

None.

Library

OLE-Server

Module

OLE-Server

Description

The library calls either OLE-part-init-new or OLE-part-Load-From-Stream after the initialize method for the object. The default method does nothing. (However, the method is not called if the container is using the obsolete IPersistStream interface instead of IPersistStreamInit.)

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
